overview: 2 Real Sisters Star In Porn! Luka shot this film in Quebec, and it is the two Lane sisters' first appearance in a European production. These two dirty little Quebeckers leave for a week-end away with their husbands to meet Dick and Amanda, who is the prude among their group of friends. A surprise is waiting for them at the chalet they have rented: Amy Lee, the daughter of the chalet owners, and she does not intend to leave. Alone all winter in her big chalet, Amy Lee impatiently awaits the high season in order to screw as many guys as she can. By working behind the sisters' backs, she will finally achieve her goal and enjoy both Jack and Djany's dicks... Both at the same time of course. Amanda will taste a girl's lips for the first time, and will slide her head between Roxy's legs. While this is going on, Shana, the youngest, has earned a double blow job in the Jacuzzi.
title: The Lane Sisters in Canada
